column5: How do you get rid of a FUNGUS. The guy who was "TO BUSY" to go with us this year to Canada is now trying to butt back into our trip. How can I get rid of this non fish catching menace???
Take me instead, I live in Kansas!
We would gladly fill in with anybody who doesent fish Pike and pout when he cant catch Walleye.
Is this JR guy the same guy who was always hooked on Pike fishing until a Giant Polock showed him how to tie a Walleye Jig on?

Tell JR or BJ or whoever that he didn't go last year so you got someone else to fill his spot. "Sorry you can't come but I will put you on the list just in case someone else stops going." Then you could massage his ego. Tell him that he's so good he doesn't need you as a guide, and suggest he form his own group.
